name: SaveTheCube
description:
In this game you protect the cube falling from height or die from spikes. Wall block , bridge block and trampoline block will help you to protect the cube. Place the blocks in time before the Main cube die.

I hope you like the game. I Know this game need more work on it but as a beginner developer I think  it is ok for me . What you think ? Please Comment below and what improvement need  in this game Do comment please .(NO ADS IN THIS GAME)
